item.title: 美联储被认为不会做出特朗普希望的持续降息承诺
item.description: 几乎所有人都预计决策者将在周三降低借贷成本。【原文：Policymakers are almost universally expected to lower borrowing costs on Wednesday.】

item.title: 受特朗普提振，阿根廷瞄准 160 亿美元的美国判决
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）的政府希望在曼哈顿的法庭上继续其最近在政治和经济上取得的一连串胜利，以推翻美国法院对南美国家做出的一项价值 160 亿美元的判决。【原文：The government of Argentine President Javier Milei is hoping its string of recent political and economic victories continues in a Manhattan courtroom as it seeks to overturn a $16 billion US court judgment against the South American nation.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率降至 6.3%，促进购房和再融资
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率降至一年新低，鼓励更多房主进行再融资，并吸引潜在买家进入市场。【原文：US mortgage rates fell to a fresh one-year low, encouraging more homeowners to refinance and drawing prospective buyers into the market.】

item.title: 纳米比亚将创纪录地单日偿还 7.5 亿美元债务
item.description: 纳米比亚财政部长埃里卡-沙福达（Ericah Shafudah）表示，纳米比亚将于周三偿还其 7.5 亿美元的欧元债券，这是西南非洲国家历史上最大的单日债务到期日。【原文：Namibia will repay its $750 million eurobond, the largest single-day debt maturity in the southwest African nation’s history on Wednesday, Finance Minister Ericah Shafudah said.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数上涨 17T 美元引发套现还是做多的争论
item.description: 随着美国股市取得六个月来罕见的上涨，投资者面临着一个两难选择：是套现获利，还是全仓投入。【原文：As US stocks power toward a rare six-month advance, investors face a dilemma: Cash out on their profits, or go all in.】

item.title: 欧洲汽车制造商加强对 Nexperia 芯片问题的警告
item.description: 欧洲汽车行业的主要游说团体警告说，由于 Nexperia 芯片的短缺日益加剧，该地区的装配线有可能闲置，欧洲汽车制造商可能不得不在几天内停止生产。【原文：European automakers may have to halt production within days, the industry’s main lobby group warned, as a deepening shortage of Nexperia chips threatens to idle assembly lines in the region.】

item.title: 卡特彼勒能源设备销售额飙升，超出预期
item.description: 卡特彼勒公司（Caterpillar Inc.【原文：Caterpillar Inc. posted higher third-quarter revenue, with its energy and transportation business boosting earnings amid rising demand for equipment needed to fuel data centers for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: Viola Credit 募集 20 亿美元基金用于金融科技债务融资
item.description: Viola Credit 是一家专门从事另类信贷业务的资产管理公司，该公司已募集了 20 亿美元的基金，用于向金融科技初创企业提供贷款。【原文：Viola Credit, an asset manager specializing in alternative credit, has raised a $2 billion fund to lend to financial technology startups.】

item.title: 英伟达正加速人工智能初创企业投资热潮
item.description: Nvidia 公司已逐渐成为风险投资领域最重要的参与者之一，但它并不是一家风险投资公司。【原文：Nvidia Corp. has gradually become one of the most important players in the venture capital world, without being a VC firm.】

item.title: 鲍威尔对利率路径的看法可能会动摇债券市场的自满情绪
item.description:
任何鹰派评论都可能引发原本活跃的国债市场出现抛售。【原文：

Any hawkish commentary likely to trigger bout of selling in an otherwise buoyant Treasury market.

】

item.title: 高盛经济学家再次呼吁英国央行 11 月降息
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Economists at Goldman Sachs Group Inc. reinstated a forecast that the Bank of England will cut interest rates at its November meeting, bucking the market consensus that the central bank will keep rates on hold.】

item.title: 英国央行称英国抵押贷款批准量跃升至 2024 年以来最高点
item.description: 尽管人们担心工党即将公布的预算案可能会增加税收，但这一迹象表明，住房需求正在趋于稳定。【原文：Britain’s high-street lenders green-lighted the largest number of home loans since the end of 2024, a sign that housing demand is stabilizing despite worries of potential tax rises in Labour’s upcoming budget.】

item.title: 英国波音供应商 Doncasters 准备在纽约上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，拥有近 250 年历史、为波音公司供货的英国金属工程集团 Doncasters Group 正在探索在纽约首次公开募股，以满足投资者对民用和军用航空航天供应商日益增长的需求。【原文：Doncasters Group, an almost 250-year-old UK metal engineering group that supplies Boeing, is exploring an initial public offering in New York to tap rising investor demand for civil and military aerospace suppliers, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 人工智能支出是 Alphabet 和微软财报的重中之重
item.description: 人工智能对美股的三年牛市至关重要，因此当全球最大的科技公司发布财报时，投资者最想看到的就是有关人工智能技术的最新支出和进展情况。【原文：Artificial intelligence is so essential to the three-year bull market in US stocks that updates on spending and progress developing the technology are what investors most want to see when the world’s biggest tech companies report earnings.】

item.title: 特朗普称与韩国达成贸易协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在出席韩国总统李在明在亚太经济合作组织峰会上举行的晚宴时表示，他与韩国达成了贸易协议。【原文：US President Donald Trump said he reached a trade agreement with South Korea as he attended a dinner hosted by South Korean President Lee Jae Myung at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit.】

item.title: 研究显示，俄罗斯人囤积的黄金相当于西班牙的储备
item.description: 一项研究显示，在过去四年里，黄金已成为俄罗斯最受欢迎的储蓄方式之一，俄罗斯消费者购买黄金的数量将相当于西班牙或奥地利的国家储备。【原文：Russian consumers’ gold purchases are set to equal the state reserves of Spain or Austria after the metal has become one of the nation’s most popular savings options during the past four years, according to a study.】

item.title: 阿克蒂斯希望通过投资数据中心加入沙特科技热潮
item.description: Actis GP LLP 正在关注对沙特阿拉伯数据中心的可能投资，该行业在这个石油资源丰富的王国的经济多元化计划中正变得越来越重要。【原文：Actis GP LLP is eyeing a possible investment in data centers in Saudi Arabia, a sector that’s assuming growing importance in the oil-rich kingdom’s economic diversification plans.】

item.title: 随着人工智能热潮的延续，英伟达将成为首家市值达 5 万亿美元的公司
item.description: 随着首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）在全球范围内大肆进行交易，Nvidia 公司有望成为首家市值达 5 万亿美元的公司，从而将人工智能行业推向新的高度。【原文：Nvidia Corp. is on track to become the first $5 trillion company as Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang’s spree of deals around the world propels the artificial intelligence trade to new heights.】

item.title: 流行的 3D 打印枪将第二修正案全球化
item.description:
FGC-9由一名德国乱伦者设计，秉承了鲜明的美国精神。【原文：

Designed by a German incel, the FGC-9 was created in a distinctly American spirit.

】

item.title: 力拓首席执行官特洛特加大力度精简庞大的矿业公司
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）的新老板告诉员工，该公司计划将庞大的企业结构集中在最赚钱的金属领域，这将是一个 "更敏锐、更简单 "的运营蓝图，但他并没有概述人们期待已久的裁员计划。【原文：Rio Tinto Group’s new boss has told staff that plans to focus the miner’s sprawling corporate structure on its most profitable metals will be a blueprint for a “sharper, simpler” operation, though he stopped short of outlining long-expected job cuts.】

item.title: 尽管资金缺口 "巨大"，巴比什仍誓言保持捷克的赤字目标
item.description: 捷克亿万富翁安德烈-巴比斯（Andrej Babis）所在的ANO党在本月大选中占据主导地位，他表示，新政府将坚持上届政府制定的明年预算赤字目标，但由于资金存在 "巨大缺口"，他发誓将重新制定计划。【原文：Czech billionaire Andrej Babis, whose ANO party dominated this month’s general election, said the new government will stick to the previous administration’s budget deficit target for next year, though he vowed to rework plans due to a “huge hole” in funding.】

item.title: 欧洲央行目标 2029 年推出数字欧元，准备工作仍在继续
item.description: 目前的准备阶段本月结束后，欧洲中央银行将继续为数字欧元奠定基础，预计四年后推出数字欧元。【原文：The European Central Bank will continue laying the groundwork for the digital euro after the current preparation phase ends this month, penciling in a launch in four years’ time.】

item.title: 全球风险加剧，澳大利亚财长向投资者发出警报
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查默斯（Jim Chalmers）表示，由于世界经济能否抵御日益加剧的不利因素或将陷入调整的不确定性增加，全球投资者都处于紧张状态，资本流动 "惶惶不安"。【原文：Australian Treasurer Jim Chalmers said global investors are on edge and capital flows are “jumpy” as uncertainty builds over whether the world economy can withstand mounting headwinds or will slip into a correction.】

item.title: 电力需求疲软，印度煤炭巨头利润下滑
item.description: 印度国营矿业巨头印度煤炭有限公司（Coal India Ltd.）报告称，由于今年电力需求疲软，影响了燃料的价格和运输，该公司第二季度利润同比下降了 31%。【原文：State mining giant Coal India Ltd. reported a 31% decline from a year earlier in second-quarter profit, following this year’s weak demand for electricity that weighed on prices and shipments of the fuel.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行（英国）因汽车贷款赔偿问题的不确定性而暂缓发布财报
item.description: 英国桑坦德银行（Santander UK）决定不公布预定的第三季度财报，因为该公司正在等待英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authority）提出的赔偿计划的明朗化，该计划针对的是被英国最大的几家汽车贷款公司误卖汽车贷款的客户。【原文：Santander UK decided not to publish its scheduled third-quarter results as it waits for clarity on a compensation plan proposed by the Financial Conduct Authority for customers who were missold car loans by some of the country’s biggest auto lenders.】

item.title: 国内需求抵消贸易影响，西班牙经济增长保持强劲
item.description: 西班牙继续保持强劲增长，巩固了其作为欧元区头号主要经济体的地位。【原文：Spain continued to record strong growth, cementing its status as the euro area’s top major economy.】

item.title: 原油暴跌，石油巨头与欧佩克携手增产
item.description: 尽管原油价格疲软，欧佩克（OPEC）及其盟国的供应量增加，但预计全球最大的石油公司将在本周公布财报时继续推进加快增产的计划。【原文：The world’s biggest oil companies are expected to press ahead with plans to accelerate production growth when they report earnings this week, despite weak crude prices and higher supplies from OPEC and its allies.】

item.title: 交易商关注脆弱的供应平衡，欧洲天然气走高
item.description: 欧洲天然气期货走高，交易商正在权衡供应充足的风险和天气变冷可能导致需求增加的风险。【原文：European natural gas futures edged higher, with traders weighing risks to ample supplies and the likelihood that colder weather will drive up demand.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚称美国告诉盟国将削减在东欧的驻军
item.description: 罗马尼亚国防部周三表示，美国已通知其盟国，决定减少在北约东翼的驻军。【原文：The US has informed its allies that it decided to reduce its troop presence on NATO’s eastern flank, Romania’s defense ministry said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Glencore 称有望实现 2025 年生产目标
item.description: Glencore Plc 表示，该公司有望实现全年生产目标，因为该公司正试图证明其正在克服运营挫折的名声。【原文：Glencore Plc said it’s on track to hit full-year production targets as the company tries to demonstrate that it’s overcoming a reputation for operational setbacks.】
